page.title: 17LEISURE
page.content: The area is served by 2 public houses both named The Coach & Horses & both oned by Donnington's Brewery.Both provide informal entertainment such as darts & bar billiards.The village pub stages a music night on a Thursday & this attract firemen from Moreton Fire College.Longborough has a thriving cricket club which plays twice a week during the season.An annual week's tour visits Cornwall.A youth club is held in the village hall.Discos are run occasionally.The women of the village attend a Friendly Club & it is intended to try & form a branch of The Womans Institute.Other occasional events are held throughout the year ie.bingo,a fete,jumble sale,harvest supper,coffee morning.The church & the school also stage entertainment at regular intervals.There are no play facilities for children in the area.
